entities.name: CustomerRelationship
entities.description: Relationship between a customer and a partner in which either can be an account or contact.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the customer relationship was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: customerRoleId
attributes.description: Choose the primary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the second party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

attributes.name: customerRelationshipId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the customer relationship.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: partnerId
attributes.description: Select the secondary account or contact involved in the customer relationship.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the business unit that owns the customer relationship.

attributes.name: converseRelationshipId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the converse relationship of the customer relationship.

attributes.name: partnerRoleId
attributes.description: Choose the secondary party's role or nature of the relationship the customer has with the primary party. The field is read-only until both parties have been selected. Administrators can configure role values under Business Management in the Settings area.

attributes.name: customerRoleDescription
attributes.description: Type additional information about the primary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

attributes.name: customerId
attributes.description: Select the primary account or contact involved in the customer relationship.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: partnerRoleDescription
attributes.description: Type additional information about the secondary party's role in the customer relationship, such as the length or quality of the relationship.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the customer relationship.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the customer relationship.
